A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw it last night and thought it was horrendously\, laughably bad. Worse than The Phantom Menace\, which I thought was impossible. 40% of the movie is pointless filler\, and boring characters dominate the movie while other\, more interesting ones\, have a lot of screen-time. I'm not sure I'd sit through it again if someone paid me. For reference\, I disliked The Force Awakens and loved Rogue One.
